iaik.security.elgamal

Class ElGamalParameterSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.security.elgamal.ElGamalParameterSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec

    public class ElGamalParameterSpec
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec
    ElGamal parameter specification.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ElGamalParameterSpec(java.math.BigInteger p, java.math.BigInteger g)
      Creates a ElGamal parameter specification, based on given prime modulus p and base generator g.
      ElGamalParameterSpec(java.math.BigInteger p, java.math.BigInteger g, int l)
      Creates a ElGamal parameter specification, based on given prime modulus p, base generator g, and random exponent size l.
